title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Joint Operation Neutralizes Terrorist Yasser Hanoun: A Deep Dive into the Jenin Air Raid”

content.rendered:
Joint message to the IDF spokesperson and Shin Bet spokespeople:

A terrorist on his way to carry out an attack was killed in an air raid in Jenin. The same terrorist had carried out several shooting attacks against our forces and against the settlements of Mevo Dotan and Meirav in recent weeks.

In a joint operation of the IDF and Shin Bet, the terrorist Yasser Hanoun, a resident of Jenin, a terrorist of the Islamic Jihad, and a former prisoner for his involvement in military activity on behalf of the organization, was killed last night (Thursday) by Shin Bet targeting and UAV of the Air Force.

Yasser was involved in recent months in many shooting attacks against IDF forces, Israeli settlements, and military positions along the seam line, including the settlements Mevo Dotan, Meirav, and also beyond Salem, Jalamah, and more. The terrorist was killed while on his way to carry out another shooting attack.

Attached is footage from the attack: https://bit.ly/3UP89KA
